content: Sruthi Sekar Skip to content I am currently an Assistant Professor at the Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) Department, IIT Bombay. I am a part of the Theory Group and Trust Lab at IITB. My research interest lies in Cryptography and other related areas in Theoretical Computer Science. BIO: 2024-Current: Assistant Professor, CSE Department, IIT Bombay. 2021-2024:      Postdoctoral Researcher, UC Berkeley, hosted by Sanjam Garg. 2016-2021:      Ph.D., Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore advised by Bhavana Kanukurthi and Manjunath Krishnapur. 2014-2016:      Master’s in Mathematics, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. 2011-2014:       Bachelor’s in Mathematics, Lady Shri Ram College, Delhi.
